scripts.build: npm run clean &&  ui5 build --include-task=generateManifestBundle generateCachebusterInfo
scripts.build-for-deploy: npm run build && npm run flatten && npm run clean-after-flatten
scripts.flatten: cp -r dist/resources/regesta/regestalibrary/* dist && cp -r dist/resources/regesta/regestalibrary/.* dist && cp dist/resources/* dist || cp dist/resources/.* dist || true
